thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Kevin Munt
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Kevin Munt

author: Kevin Munt
title: Kevin Munt
text: I haven't bothered doing reviews etc & this is the 1st ever. This time I thought Banggood deserved a mention. It's not about the item brought but about the delivery. The item was lost in the post. Banggood offered to have it resent. As this was probably not Banggood's fault I offered to pay 1/2 the cost. Banggood thanked me & said this was not necessary. I've had other items sent in the past that were damaged & they replaced them at no charge to me. Thanks for good service Banggood.
